name: Starscape Escape
description:
Three kids lost in space try to find their way back home. Planned to be a puzzle platformer where each of the protagonists would be able to gain different abilities to help them complete each level, such as double jumping, reversing gravity, or creating patches of slippery ice. 

Further development is unlikely at this time.

Controls: WASD to move, spacebar to jump, Q to switch which character you're controlling. Get all three kids to the red platform at the end of the level to win. 

Characters:

Allison (red overalls): She's the oldest, the most practical, and the de facto leader of the group.

Bee (blue shirt): Xe's the youngest and the most energetic, and likes to tackle problems headfirst.

Caleb (yellow shirt): He's the calmest and most social of the trio, able to befriend almost anyone.
